title: Can i get my chat logs for a past game.
body: I had a great game, and the team chat was really fun and interesting, is there any way for me to get the chat logs for that game?

replies.body:
It's always really exciting when you get matched up with a team full of other players that can engage in friendly banter or conversation. :)

Unfortunately, we cannot provide full chat logs for a match. I hope you get matched up with really fun players again, as I know those experiences are what makes League great, at least they do for me. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions that I can answer.
So i got chat banned but never got the chat log.
its funny you can go back and watch the game and see the chat but they wont give you chat logs lmfao.....????????? like what

i recently had a game with a 4 man premade
they were all toxic and they convinced the other team that i was being toxic
if i had access to chat logs i could prove that i wasnt being toxic and that i wasnt worthy of a report.

this is why we need the chat logs. this happens to me WAAAAAAAYYY too often. and there is nothing i can do about it. yes, i can report them on the end, but does Riot do anything about it? of course not... we need the old tribunal back, where players decided if the person in project needs to be excused or punished. rito pls we really need this.

This is so true for me. I just got to honor lvl 1 from honor lvl 4. Got chat restrictions and a message saying I forfeit my end of season rewards. Because of a situation where my team of trolls got me report by enemy team as well. Noe Riot set me a little chat box with the Chat logs of me only in it. In the format, they sent it to me. The chat can be read way differently than if it were put into context. They took my chat out of context to where it could actually look bad like I'm toxic now. I and my premade have been gaming together in the league for a year now. We sometimes call each other hoe or slut in game. which has never been an issue before. But in the chat when they take it out of context like this. They are banning me from calling my friend a hoe in a playful manner. something I have done for 3 years in the league and never had anything wrong with it. all of a sudden I encounter a troll of premades who convince enemy team im trolling and they ban, me for it? Has Riot lost their minds? and I can't even access my chat logs. I made a thread and everyone is asking me to post the chat logs to validate my case. But I have no possible way of doing so. So Riot you guys made me into a villain. and there is no jury. there is no true investigation. I just get Chat banned? from a troll skewing the story to the enemy team? and then you take my text out of context? likeee

I feel you, I am in a same situation. Want to prove that I did nothing wrong and send them my chat logs but I can't, and after my teammates flaming all game in chat and someone on the enemy team flaming and wanting to report me for no reason I can do nothing about it but enjoy my 24 game chat restriction. Riot should really do something about this and I hope they will someday
Same thing just happened to me i got a 26 game chat ban and got my rewards and honor taken away because they dont even read their chat.

MY MAN,
I feel you so much.They banned me for 14 days recently because i said in team chat report (my Friend) and a kid thought i was serious.If you want or if I can i will post as a reply Riot's answer.
Noooo that's weird but did u have a Leo in it or a soraka? Lol
Well you should know RIOT got bought by a Chinese company, which is the troll of the world, they dont even have law there, so why expect fair ? Just  change another game.
i want chat log too someone asked me to commit suicide in front of my parents for Christmas :P
i want chat log too someone asked me to commit suicide in front of my parents for Christmas :P

Yes please post it and I'll post mine also. The responses to. The responses I get from riot are so full of BS it's unbelievable. it's as if they support the actual trolls. and then they punish the ones who defend themselves from the trolls.
